description: I use TigerVNC in software testing in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. It helps me a lot to connect to various computer system, having different CPU architectures.

First of all, im typing this on my pinephone. This app works perfectly in conjunction with the touchpad emulator found at the link below and scaling set to 1.5x using wl-randr. With these tools I can access my desktop to complete a task easily. Havent tried using plasma or sxmo but assume it would work just fine. Havent tried remmina yet but figured this one was simple and quick.

https://gitlab.com/CalcProgrammer1/TouchpadEmulator
